name: 廖昭文
objective: 本課程設計重點有三：(1)藉由精選的中級程度教材加強學生必備的基礎文法觀念和句型結構；(2)使學生確切把握閱讀要領以及充分瞭解寫作的各種技巧，重心在生字、片語、句法的解釋和基本寫作技巧的分析；(3)透過練習加強聽、說、讀、寫的知能及表達。
schedule:
Week 1: Course introduction  Week 2: The home of the olive 
Week 3: The home of the olive; Sofrito sensation  Week 4: Sofrito sensation   Week 5: Song of the Humpback   Week 6: Dogs in human world  Week 7: Was King Tut murdered?    Week 8: Who Killed the Iceman?     Week 9: Midterm exam    Week 10: Pompeii and Herculaneum, Italy   Week 11: Grand Central Terminal  Week 12: Mumbai: city of dreams  Week 13: The flooding of New Orleans   Week 14: Tropical Cyclones   Week 15: Tropical Cyclones  Week 16: Cities beneath the sea    Week 17: Cities beneath the sea; Final Exam
scorePolicy:
Attendance, quizzes, assignments       30%
Midterm exam                           30%
Final exam                             40%
materials: Reading Explorer 2, MacIntyre, P, Heinle, Cengage Learning, 2009
